title: Is it possible to study philosophy as an optional subject for the UPSC without coaching? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi soul with universe. You know a bit of reality, then why are you stuck in myth? You can do anything as you also know. But you would need help definitely if you had not studied the subject in early stages of academic sphere. Though the notion is limited because it varies on individual's ability and understanding. Everyone's ability and understanding is equal but the differences come with everyone's level of commitment towards learning and teaching as well as upholding truth.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Soul With Universe
